The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with a mass amount of fossilized bone and what seems like thousands of scorpions. So what are possible threats to ourselves in the long lost desert city?
The first one is a group of people who seems to be praying to a some kind of sand pterodactyl.

I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie in a theater..

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, with one character good, one bad.
